title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Self-Directed Projects for Enhancing Engineering Measurement Reasoning Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Complete ≥3 projects solving logical reasoning problems encountered in real surveying contexts
Improve error rates by ≥15% by applying scientific thinking models to measurement data interpretation
Analyze individual thinking patterns and establish learning strategies using TOLT-based self-diagnostic tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
